skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: slack and company
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Slack and Company is a business to business marketing agency based in Chicago, Illinois. Slack and Company has spent the last 30 years using thoughtful marketing strategies, big ideas, and flawless execution to bring brand and demand together for clients all over the world—and across many different industries.

This skill will help you learn things like who Slack and Company is and how they can help you with your business to business marketing challenges.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
